newsitem.title: GERMANY: SAP R/3 to track Siemens travel.
newsitem.headline: SAP R/3 to track Siemens travel.

text.p: Business software supplier SAP AG said on Thursday it won a contract to supply a travel expense system for Germany industrial group Siemens AG.

Based on a module of SAP's R/3 management software, the system would allow 40,000 Siemens employees to settle expense reports via an Internet-like internal computer network called an Intranet. It would also connect to Siemens' existing finance-tracking computer system, SAP said.
The value of the deal was not disclosed.

The travel expense function is a part of the R/3 Human Resources module. R/3 is the top seller of its type worldwide and can also track manufacturing, purchasing and accounting data in large companies.
The Siemens contract marks an important win for SAP because Siemens has previously installed business management software from PeopleSoft Inc.
